Text.val: This will locate the first record starting with the given letter.
Locate is often used to find the "closest matching" record in a Data source.
However, it can also be used to find an exact match, if the value is known.
Locate differs from Range in that it does not limit how many records are shown to the user.
The View Refresh forces the range to reset and the records to be reloaded
when the user changes the tab choice.

ExpSyntax.val: 'DV07: How Do I Make the Task Position on a Certain Record When it Starts?'

Text.val: The Last Name properties have Locate From equal to the value specified in the calling program.
This task writes to two text BLOBS, then reads them into a memory table.
This reads in the blob, using a ':' as a delimiter
